content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Steam engine at position(-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler at position(-4.5, 16.0)
- Offshore pump at position(-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected by pipe groups carrying water and steam
- Electricity network (id=12806) connecting multiple positions

### Iron Plate Production Line 1
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at position(41.0, -82.0)
- Wooden chest at position(41.5, -80.5)
- Burner inserter at position(41.5, -79.5)

### Iron Plate Production Line 2
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at position(-28.0, -61.0)
- Wooden chest at position(-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter at position(-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace at position(-25.0, -59.0)
- Burner inserter at position(-23.5, -58.5)
- Storage chest at position(-22.5, -58.5) containing iron plates

### Coal Mining Setup
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at position(-18.0, -53.0)
- Wooden chest at position(-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter at position(-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace at position(-15.0, -51.0)
- Burner inserter at position(-13.5, -50.5)
- Storage chest at position(-12.5, -50.5) containing iron plates

### Automation Science Pack Production
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at position(8.5, 13.5)
- Input chest at position(5.5, 13.5) containing iron gear wheels
- Output chest at position(11.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserters at positions(6.5, 13.5) and (10.5, 13.5)
- Connected belt groups for material transport
- Stone furnace at position(14.0, 14.0)

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing lab
- Check if the target position is clear of other entities before placing the lab
- Verify the correct coordinates for lab placement

### Errors with fuel management
- Ensure coal is available in inventory before attempting to insert into machines
- Verify the existence and location of coal storage/production before attempting to extract

### Errors with lab interaction
- Ensure lab is properly placed before attempting to interact with it
- Verify the correct position coordinates when trying to access the lab

### Errors with resource extraction
- Verify the existence of resources in storage containers before attempting extraction
- Ensure the correct chest coordinates when attempting to extract items

### Production bottlenecks
- Copper plates are missing for automation science pack production
- Multiple machines are out of fuel and need coal
